about_the_game:
The city where your vet clinic is located has been struck by a massive financial crisis. You're starting to feel hopeless when you receive a letter inviting you to join a cat rescue at the Muur Islands. Discover a new life in this mysterious island and its cat-healing traditions. Grow medicinal plants, craft medicine, diagnose symptoms, establish relationships with the townsfolk, explore every possible corner and untangle the mysteries the island has to offer.


  • Grow and harvest medicinal plants native to the island.
  • Craft treatments for different diseases.


  • Accept patients that other clinics haven't been able to treat.
  • Diagnose cats using various tests.
  • Use your own in-house medicine to help your patients.


  • Establish relationships with the island's inhabitants. Make friendships, fall in love, grow the community... choice is yours!
  • Get to know foreigners that come to the island looking for your invaluable vet skills.
  • Live all sorts of experiences by attending seasonal festivals with your new neighbors.
